alert.note: Alert for Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 18 at 8:27PM CDT until June 18 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Rankin County in central Mississippi... Southern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Fannin, or 9 miles northeast of Brandon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Pelahatchie and Leesburg around 835 PM CDT. Morton and Branch around 840 PM CDT. Pulaski and Forkville around 845 PM CDT. Forest and Hillsboro around 855 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
